TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlField extends Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.Fields.BaseRichFieldType

Docs.summary: Represents a publishing-extensible field type for defining rich HTML content.

remarks.para: A string of HTML is its value class. It uses the object as the field control to edit and display it.

Docs.param: The name of the field to create from the object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the object.

Docs.param: The collection of fields into which to add the field.
The name of the type of new field to add.
The display name for the new field.

Docs.summary: Gets a control for editing values in this HtmlField property.

Docs.summary: Gets the input HTML string value.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetFieldValueAsHtml (object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetFieldValueAsHtml(object value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetFieldValueAsHtml (value As Object) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetFieldValueAsHtml(System::Object ^ value);

Docs.param: The string to convert to HTML.
Docs.summary: Gets the HTML string value with any reusable content sections expanded.

remarks.para: If the HTML in the value input has any special markup that identifies reusable content sections, the returned value retrieves these content sections with their current values expanded.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetFieldValueAsText (object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetFieldValueAsText(object value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetFieldValueAsText (value As Object) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetFieldValueAsText(System::Object ^ value);

Docs.param: The string to convert to text.
Docs.summary: Gets the string value with any reusable content sections expanded and all HTML tags removed.

remarks.para: If the HTML in the value input has any special markup that identifies reusable content sections, the returned value retrieves these content sections with their current values expanded and all HTML tags removed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool WikiLinking { get; }
.property instance bool WikiLinking
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property WikiLinking As Boolean
public: virtual property bool WikiLinking { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the wiki links in this multi-ling text field are translated into HTML hyperlinks.
Docs.value: A Boolean value that represents whether wiki linking is active.

remarks.para: The class always returns true because it always expects wiki linking to be active.
